text: @NYGovCuomo We love you here in California, Governor Cumo! Your morning briefings are informative and a refreshing part of my day. You continue to be an Amazing LEADER. Will you reconsider your decision and run for President???? #CuomoForPresident #cuomobriefing #COVID19
